abstracts.cdata!:
The Avian Influenza and human pandemic
            preparedness and response project for Bosnia and Herzegovina
            aims to minimize the threat posed to humans and the poultry
            industry by the Highly Pathogenic Avian Influenza (HPAI)
            infection and other zoonoses, by enhancing both animal and
            human health infectious disease response and control
            capacities. To achieve this, three areas will be supported
            by the project: prevention, preparedness and planning; and
            response and containment. Achieving these goals will
            contribute to diminishing the burden o f disease and loss of
            productivity, limiting the regional spread of HPAI, and
            enhancing economic and social prospects at the national,
            regional, and global levels.
